org.ensembl.driver
Interface DnaDnaAlignmentAdaptor

All Superinterfaces:
Adaptor, FeatureAdaptor, java.rmi.Remote
public interface DnaDnaAlignmentAdaptor
extends FeatureAdaptor

Provides access to DnaDnaAlignments in a datasource.
